channel.title: [PI] npc's dropping stuff rep++ if you figure it out
channel.description: idk wtf is up with my npc drops. well tbh ive never done them on a PI. just started my first PI and im making a thing like tutorial island. the only last bit i need is making a chicked drop an item. ive followed all tutorials. and its ganna be a shame if 160 dialogues later i'd have to change it... heres my npcdrop file thing. not the config i forget what it is. but this is where u put it. [code]#Man drops 1:1 995:100 554:100 #Guard drops 9:1 995:250 555:100 #Chicken drops 41:100 14892:1 #Penguin drops 131:100 995:200000 537:1[/code] thats only a few of the list, but each of these works, and the chicken doesnt. im trying to make it drop an artefact every time to teach a player about item interaction. i have the item all set uo, but the chicken just wont drop it...

item.title: [PI] npc's dropping stuff rep++ if you figure it out
item.dc:creator: @rrooaarr rrooaarr
item.description:
@rrooaarr wrote:

idk wtf is up with my npc drops. well tbh ive never done them on a PI. just started my first PI and im making a thing like tutorial island. the only last bit i need is making a chicked drop an item. ive followed all tutorials. and its ganna be a shame if 160 dialogues later i’d have to change it…
heres my npcdrop file thing. not the config i forget what it is. but this is where u put it.

#Man drops 1:1 995:100 554:100 #Guard drops 9:1 995:250 555:100 #Chicken drops 41:100 14892:1 #Penguin drops 131:100 995:200000 537:1
thats only a few of the list, but each of these works, and the chicken doesnt. im trying to make it drop an artefact every time to teach a player about item interaction. i have the item all set uo, but the chicken just wont drop it…
